<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Basic Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3006) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Pervasive Magic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=390" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 219 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Cantrip Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3005)

</column>

---

You increase your ability to cast spells. You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170) granted by spellcasting archetypes, gaining a spell repertoire. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the basic, expert, and master spellcasting benefits from pervasive magic feats, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire: a common spell of the magical tradition matching your trait, or another spell of that tradition that you have learned or discovered.

<title level="2">Basic Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3007)
name: Basic Spellcasting
